articles.author: Maria Cheng
articles.title: Puzzling outbreak of liver disease in kids spreads to EU, US - The Associated Press
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Health officials say they have detected more cases of a mysterious liver disease in children that was first identified in Britain, with new infections spreading to Europe and the U.S.
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) Health officials say they have detected more cases of a mysterious liver disease in children that was first identified in Britain, with new infections spreading to Europe and the U.S.
